Pope Benedict XV The last pope to chose the name Benedict was an Italian noble who canonized Joan of Arc and spent much of his papacy trying in vain to end World War I. Born Giacomo della Chiesa in Genoa , Italy , Pope Benedict XV was pontiff from 1914 to 1922 , the third shortest term for a 20th-century pope .
